title: Points Squeeze: WorldTour Relegation/Promotion Battle Tightens as XDS Astana Surges, Picnic PostNL Slips
content:
Analysis: WorldTour relegation/promotion tightens up as the action shifts into the points-rich grand tours. For teams on the bubble, every sprint is now a race for survival.

Read the full article at Points Squeeze: WorldTour Relegation/Promotion Battle Tightens as XDS Astana Surges, Picnic PostNL Slips on Velo.
author: ahood
